text: Isabel Díaz Ayuso (; born 17 October 1978) is a Spanish politician. She is the President of the Community of Madrid. She is a member of the People's Party (PP). In March 2020, Díaz Ayuso was diagnosed with COVID-19 and diarrhea during the 2020 coronavirus pandemic. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: Isabel Díaz Ayuso
